CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: E.C.D. has been in pursuit of being the world's best Land Rover customization and production facility. Since our start in 2013, we have established a facility geared towards producing the most customized Land Rovers with the highest quality of parts and the highest quality labor force building each vehicle.
